metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20431 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Libextractor through 1.8 has a NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the function process_metadata() in plugins/ole2_extractor.c. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled metadata. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
